title: Afghan refugees being let down by UK, says think tank
description: More In Common says lessons need to be learned, on the two-year anniversary of the fall of Kabul.

title: Man Utd 1-0 Wolves: Gary O'Neil says Jon Moss admitted penalty error
description: Wolves boss Gary O'Neil says elite referees manager Jon Moss told him he "could not believe" his side were not given a late penalty in the 1-0 defeat at Manchester United.

title: Grooming cases at record high amid online safety laws delay
description: The NSPCC says 34,000 online sexual crimes have been recorded since it first called for tougher laws.

title: At least 12 die in inferno at petrol station in southern Russia

title: Cincinnati Open: Venus Williams beats Veronika Kudermetova for biggest win in four years

title: The Hundred 2023: England's Tammy Beaumont and Joe Root feature in plays of the day
